INFJ.quote: You don't chase the spotlight — you build the light inside you, and let it shine when the world needs it most.
INFJ.animal_desc: Soft gaze, sharp soul — they disappear for weeks but return wiser and ready to save humanity.

INFP.quote: You feel the world not with your hands, but with your whole heart.
INFP.animal_desc: Tiptoes through life with gentle dreams, until you threaten their values — then it's emotional kung fu.

INTJ.quote: While others dream, you design blueprints for the impossible.
INTJ.animal_desc: Sees through every excuse before you've even opened your mouth — plotting world domination, but with a reading lamp.

INTP.quote: You dive into thoughts most people didn't even know existed.
INTP.animal_desc: Thinking eight ideas at once, forgetting half of them, then inventing something no one's ever seen before.

ENFJ.quote: You build empires of kindness where others only see empty fields.
ENFJ.animal_desc: Will organise your life, hype you up, bake you a cake, and save your soul — all before noon.

ENFP.quote: Your spirit is a firework show set to your favourite song.
ENFP.animal_desc: Laughing at their own jokes, inspiring revolutions between naps, and somehow making existential crises look cute.

ENTJ.quote: You don't follow the path. You build it.
ENTJ.animal_desc: Wakes up, chooses leadership, and flies three business moves ahead while you're still finding your coffee.

ENTP.quote: Your ideas are faster than the speed of light.
ENTP.animal_desc: Charmingly causing chaos, but somehow it always sounds like a brilliant idea when they explain it.

ISFJ.quote: You weave safety nets from threads of pure love.
ISFJ.animal_desc: Remembers your birthday, your allergies, your childhood traumas — and carries them all with quiet, unstoppable love.

ISFP.quote: You live life like a secret painting — vivid, beautiful, and quietly bold.
ISFP.animal_desc: Looks aloof but actually wrote you a secret poem — just don't expect them to admit it.

ISTJ.quote: You are the silent architect of stability.
ISTJ.animal_desc: Methodically building empires one brick at a time — and judging you gently for not reading the instructions.

ISTP.quote: You trust your hands more than any map.
ISTP.animal_desc: Silently judging your DIY skills — then fixing everything with a paperclip and a smirk.

ESFJ.quote: You build homes not with bricks, but with kindness.
ESFJ.animal_desc: Gallops into your life with homemade lasagna, party invites, and a terrifyingly well-organised group chat.

ESFP.quote: You turn every moment into a celebration.
ESFP.animal_desc: Part-time life of the party, full-time collector of inside jokes, spontaneous karaoke champion by destiny.

ESTJ.quote: You set the rules that the rest of us are secretly grateful for.
ESTJ.animal_desc: Roars first, asks questions later — but it’s only because they genuinely believe you deserve the best.

ESTP.quote: You live where adrenaline and opportunity collide.
ESTP.animal_desc: Crashes through the jungle of life at full speed, somehow still looking cooler than everyone else.
